articles.title: Quit vaping | E-cigarette use harms heart, lungs, brain, according to new research from American Heart Association - KABC-TV
articles.description: As the number of young people using electronic nicotine delivery systems grows, so does evidence that e-cigarettes may be harmful to human health.
articles.content: As the number of young people using electronic nicotine delivery systems grows, so does evidence that e-cigarettes may be harmful to human health. More studies are needed to determine the long-term i… [+5640 chars]
